widgets_values: medium close-up of a fluffy white baby bunny with oversized expressive eyes, sitting in a lush meadow surrounded by softly swaying pastel wildflowers, vibrant green grass illuminated by warm golden sunlight, gentle breeze rippling through the scene, background filled with dreamy blurred trees and puffy white clouds in a clear blue sky, soft focus highlights and rim light accentuating the fur texture, cheerful and innocent mood, highly detailed fur with smooth shading and subtle shadowing under the bunny, stylized realism with Pixar-like charm, slow circular camera orbit around the bunny to enhance the whimsical and joyful atmosphere

nodes.title: Pixaroma - Note - START HERE
widgets_values:
# MODELS USED IN THIS WORKFLOW  


## 🟣 Load Checkpoint
Download **ltxv-13b-0.9.7-distilled-fp8.safetensors** model from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/resolve/main/ltxv-13b-0.9.7-distilled-fp8.safetensors?download=true)

Place in: **..ComfyUI/models/checkpoints** 

You can find more versions [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/tree/main)  

---
## 🟣 Load Clip

T5 Text Encoder (choose one)
- **Option A (Full Version):** [t5xxl_fp16.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/mochi_preview_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/t5xxl_fp16.safetensors?download=true)
- **Option B (Smaller Version):** [t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors](https://huggingface.co/Comfy-Org/mochi_preview_repackaged/resolve/main/split_files/text_encoders/t5xxl_fp8_e4m3fn_scaled.safetensors?download=true)

Place in folder: **`ComfyUI/models/text_encoders`**

---

## 🟣 🅛🅣🅧 LTXV Latent Upsampler Model Loader
Download **ltxv-spatial-upscaler-0.9.7.safetensors** model from [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/resolve/main/ltxv-13b-0.9.7-distilled-fp8.safetensors?download=true)

Place in: **..ComfyUI/models/upscale_models** 

You can find more versions [HERE](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video/tree/main)  

---
## 🧩 Nodes Installed from Manager  

- **ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite**
- **ComfyUI-Easy-Use**
- **rgthree-comfy**
- **ComfyUI-LTXVideo**
- **ComfyUI-KJNodes**
---

## 📚 Resources  
🎥 **Tutorials:** [Pixaroma YouTube Channel](https://www.youtube.com/@pixaroma)  
💬 **Community Discord:** [Join Here](https://discord.com/invite/gggpkVgBf3)

More info about LTXV [HERE on GitHub](https://github.com/Lightricks/ComfyUI-LTXVideo/) and [HERE on HuggingFace](https://huggingface.co/Lightricks/LTX-Video)

nodes.title: Video Length Info
widgets_values:
### How to Configure Video Length
Set the "num_frames" parameter in the 🅛🅣🅧 LTXV Base Sampler node based on desired duration:

| **Duration** | **Length Value** | **Calculation** |
|--------------|------------------|----------------|
| 1 second     | 25               | (24 × 1) + 1   |
| 2 seconds    | 49               | (24 × 2) + 1   |
| 3 seconds    | 73               | (24 × 3) + 1   |
| 4 seconds    | 97               | (24 × 4) + 1   |
| 5 seconds    | 121              | (24 × 5) + 1   |

nodes.title: ChatGPT Formula for Prompts
widgets_values: Craft detailed prompt for AI video generator, avoiding quotation marks. When I provide a description or image, translate it into a prompt that captures a cinematic, movie-like quality, focusing on elements like scene, style, mood, lighting, and specific visual details. Ensure that the prompt evokes a rich, immersive atmosphere, emphasizing textures, depth, and realism. Always incorporate slow camera or cinematic movement to enhance the feeling of fluidity and visual storytelling. Keep the wording precise yet descriptive, directly usable, and designed to achieve a high-quality, film-inspired result.
